title: 15 Card Beater Lot - Many Different Tobacco/Caramel/Gum/Strip Types *PRICE DROP* $75
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: 15 Card Beater Lot - Many Different Tobacco/Caramel/Gum/Strip Types *PRICE DROP* $75
posts.post_content:
I have for sale this 15 card assorted lot.  As you can see by the scans, these are about as low grade as they come.  However, this lot is a cheap and easy way to get a start on a variety of different sets, and even includes a HOF'er.  Only looking to sell this as a lot.  $75 takes it.  Shipping is on me.  Thanks for looking and please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve the lot.

Cards Pictured:

E90-1 - Harry Howell
E92 Dockman - Sherry Magee
E95 - Nick Maddox
W516-1 - Babe Adams
T202 end panel - JT Meyers
T205 - Howard Camnitz
T205 - Charles Street
T206 - Heinie Berger
T206 - Frank Oberlin
T207 - Ivan Olson
1933 Goudey #112 - Fred Schulte
1934 Goudey #58 - Earl Grace
1936 Goudey "Wide Pen" - Tommy Padden
1934-36 Diamond Stars #25 -Walter Berger
1934-36 Diamond Stars #35 - Earle Averill (HOF)
one bump for a price drop.  $90 delivered takes the lot
Last bump for a final price drop to $75 for the lot.  Thanks!
